page.title: 05School Dinners 2
page.content: A survey was cunducted within the junior department and it was discovered that the most popular first course was:_ Roast Beef, Yorkshire Pudding, Saute potatoes, Peas, Gravy. The most popular sweet was:_ American crisp with optional bottle of milk. The price of a school dinner at the moment is 65p per day (Â£3.25 per week payable on Monday mornings.) The meals are cooked on the premises by one cook,Miss.J.Symonds.We are supervised by one assistant during the dinner hour. Approximately 80% of the children use the school meals service.
